scenario_1.persona_desc: A highly skilled and experienced architectural technologist with a passion for sustainable design and construction. This individual has a deep understanding of the practical and technical aspects of the construction industry, and is skilled in using computer-assisted design software to create and present plans and designs. They have a strong background in mathematics and engineering, and are highly proficient in using AutoCAD and other design software. This individual is also a strong communicator and has excellent presentation and technical writing skills. They are highly motivated and have a passion for creating sustainable and innovative structures. They are a valuable asset to any construction company or engineering firm.

responses.thought: I will choose the option that gives me the higher amount of money, which is Right. Even though Person A receives more, I still get $400, which is the same as the Left option.

responses.thought: The Right option ensures a fair split where both individuals receive an equal amount of money ($400 each). This aligns with principles of fairness and equity, which are important considerations in distributive justice. Although the Left option would give me more money, it leaves Person A with nothing, which is unfair.
